title: English criminal justice
brief_description: An explanation of court procedure in England, showing the various types of courts and their particular functions. The cases range from a simple Petty Sessions case to a murder trial at the Old Bailey.
description: An explanation of court procedure in England, showing the various types of courts and their particular functions. The cases range from a simple Petty Sessions case to a murder trial at the Old Bailey.
